page.title: 17Southend:The Pier
page.content: Perhaps the most famous feature of Southend is the{pleasure pier}which is the longest one of tis kind in the world.Before{1976}it ran{trains}to the end of its{1.25 mile}length to the {Lifeboat Station}and an amusement arcade.Sadly,in 1976,the end of the pier was destroyed by fire and has not yet been rebuilt although many plans to reconstruct it have been submitted. At the shore end of the pier are the popular{bowling}lanes which are open to the public.Now the public mainly use the pier for walking along in the nice weather and for{fishing during the fishing season. Next to the pier is a popular children's playground called{Peter {Pan's Playground}where they can enjoy all sorts of rides from a big wheel to go-karting.
